data.message:
Every single report I submitted to pull bloody dogfighting videos resulted in the videos not being removed because they dont defy "community standards" - really, Facebook? Dogs tearing each other apart is ok, but krom forbid someone slips a nipple?

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Pitbull-Underground-Laknas/366115430207371

replies.message: Wagner Abercrombie  - Im reporting the page you brought to my attention. It looks like they declined ALL of our reports.

I've seen those videos that Facebook deems appropriate for their social presence. Dogs ripping into each other and blood gushing all over walls. It is horrifying and disgusting. Too bad Facebook isn't on the right side of it.

Just amazing.  Facebook is not a nice place no matter how hard Mark Z. try's to pull it off.  My dream is for someone to come along and offer a top of the line social network that care about their customers and Facebook falls to it's knees.
